title: Why I believe there should be another rank before b5
body:
Im not talking to put people down that I consider shit, really it is to separate those who can't get their head out of their ass and self improve. Otherwise for most people down the lower tiers its gg your stuck there because **who** can figure out what they are doing wrong when their teammates are doing 20% worse then they are screaming obscenities at them... (If you can get the chat data from my last game you will know what I am talking about.) The reason I want this new "rank" to be the silver bullet for this problem is simply this: you can tell people to do all sorts of things but only 1 in 5 will listen to the advice and really get serious about helping themselves.

The rank is like master tier is to fix cycling immunity in challenger, a limbo of sorts that cycles them down from bronze into this one tier rank that isn't at all competitive but actually a learning curve for them to start walking properly if you get my "drift" in a sense. It isn't just "kindergarden before school" or not suitable for ranked but a springboard where they actually have the ability to play at their full capacity in ranked after some basic lacking principles from their game in general have been "self improved". The community much remains the same and you can't tell it to be different but at least separate the aspiring from the people who don't give a shit about genuinely helping themselves improve, maybe help them to give a shit.



P.S. Also this affects normals where you wont actually get matched with them unless you were very much the same.


This system is very disjointed and hasen't been "designed" -_to prepare the preliminary sketch or the plans for (a work to be executed), especially to plan the form and structure _ at all, it is just an idea to be picked up or lost in time (hopefully the first). To put in perspective, a system like this without huge amounts of market research and data/ work will destroy league but eventually everything will get smoothed out and it will start working. Unless you do do lots of work on it (if so then I would be very humbled to meet you ;)) then you have a functional system (of course rough starts are expected)

Peace

Edit: For those who don't understand why I think this; _The rank would not function as normal, its not considered even a placement in ranked but like "processing" where you are in the middle of a transition between places. The rank is made just so you can get out if you are ready (I mean the rank will function sort of like intro bots with tips and guidelines but much more advanced. the end of match screen should have a summary of where you went wrong, how you could improve, and why.)._

Edit 2: This is probably not the greatest idea but the lower tier could mostly be placements with goals to reach (The client sets the goals, lets you write down steps in client that show in game how to get there and then gives you a summery of how you are doing and suggestions for improvement)

all you need to do is carry, and don't say they are soo bad you can't carry because you can I know this for a fact I was silver 3 last season, made a smuf and got it to gold in a week with a 20-3-5 kda. It's not because i was good hence why my main was silver 3, but it was because I stuck to what i know and didn't care 2 shits i have never did aswell on my main as i have my smurf because i care on my main, I don't care on my smurf. If you stick to what you know and you believe in yourself and practice you'll be where you are supposed to and I know you here this all the time but its true you just need to accept you're trash and move on thats what I did last season (not saying I'm good) i went from g3 to s5 and accepted i was trash then I was like I gotta carry, moved on, carried people hardcore and went on to get plat 3. If you are looking for advice because you want to carry from what looked at your match history don't play Rengar don't play any Champion with a semi high skill cap I recommend Ziggs Mid he is super easy to farm which is enough to carry at times and just play safe. Farm up, get items, don't play aggressive until you know the match ups, just make sure you have 130 farm @20 (at least) then in team fights just play back don;t be aggressive pop your combo with those dank items you achieved from cs'ing like a boss and win games even if your team is losing bad you have enough wave clear to hold them out until your team is relevant.
